public class Test implements List {
}
if you choose the override wizard from context menu the result is e.g.
	/* (non-Javadoc)
	 * @see java.util.Collection#add(java.lang.Object)
	 */
	public boolean add(Object arg0) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

	}

If you launch quickfix for adding methods all is fine!

public class Test implements List {
}
if you choose the override wizard from context menu the result is e.g.
	/* (non-Javadoc)
	 * @see java.util.Collection#add(java.lang.Object)
	 */
	public boolean add(Object arg0) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

	}

If you launch quickfix for adding methods all is fine!
fixed > 20030207
*** Bug 31239 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
